title: Vizard eSports Looking for a New Team!

embed.description: The latest Tweets from Vizard eSports (@VizardGG). Official twitter of Vizard.gg! Semi-Professional eSports Organization Currently Competing in CSGO & LoL! Owner @Vizard_Meat

body:
Hey There!

Vizard eSports are currently looking at starting up a new League of Legends Roster for 2017!
Think you've got what it takes? Add MeatPeople.

Requirements:
-Must have Mic
-Must be willing to commit to weekly sessions and practices.

There are No Current Age or Rank restrictions, however you will be trialed.
Thanks! See you on the Rift!

replies.body: I would be keen to try as support, when would i be able to have a chat in client?
i would be keen to TRY out for an ADC position if you would like to add me. Quarante Sept
I added you. I happily fit your requirements criteria.
